data.text: Aho ghumwande Imulungu tsakalonga na aba tsetu mala nyingi na kwa nzila nyingi kubitila manabii wake,
lekeni mne ghamatsuwa ghano gha ukutsigha kalonga na twetwe kubitila Imwanaghe, iyamsaghule na yamwing'ile pfinu pfose pfiwe pfake, kuya kubitila yeye Imulungu tsakalumba isi yose.

Yeye katumwemwesela utunitso we Imulungu, na keghala ghendo ne Imulungu imwenyegho pfayali. Kaikindilisa isi yose ighendelele kuwa baho kwa mbuli yake ine ingupfu. Hamalitse sang'ano ya kuwatenda iwanu wele kulawa mne nzambi tsawo, kakala kulanga ubali wa ghumoko ghwe kujilo ghwe Imulungu.
Imwana katendighwa mkulu kubita wamalaika, ka taghwa lyeng'ighwe ne Imulungu pfalili kulu kubita taghwa lyawo.
Mana Imulungu ng'amlongele ghendo malaika wowose,
Lekeni Imulungu hayomghala chaudele wake muisi, kolonga,
Ghweghwe konoghela ghamatendo ighomnoghela Imulungu na koghahila ghehile.
Lelo kuya wamalaika tsina nani? Wawo muhe iwomsang'anila Imulungu, na waghalighwa nae kuwapfila awala iwatsobokela ukombotsi.
